Article Title: Why Intel is selling 49% of Irish Venture to Apollo for $11 billion
Article Text:
Why the need for external funding for Intel

Intel Corp has reportedly struck a deal with Apollo Global Management Inc to sell a stake in a venture controlling an Irish plant for $11 billion. According to a report in Bloomberg, this move aims to secure additional funding for Intel's significant factory network expansion.The investment firm will acquire a 49% stake in a joint venture that operates Intel's Fab 34 facility, marking the second such investment program for Intel to ease the financial burden of its ambitious expansion plans.Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger is reportedly spearheading a costly endeavor to regain the top spot in the semiconductor industry. This involves substantial investments in product revamping and global factory construction to strengthen Intel's manufacturing capabilities and attract external clients for outsourced production.The once industry leader, Intel, has been compelled to seek external funding through its "Smart Capital" program."The announcement underscores Intel's ongoing progress in its transformation strategy," the company stated in a press release. "The company is making continued strides to establish financial flexibility and expedite its strategy, including investments in global manufacturing operations, all while preserving a strong balance sheet".Construction of the plant, situated on an existing Intel site near Dublin, Ireland, is nearing completion, according to the company. The transaction, finalizing in the second quarter of 2024, frees up capital for Intel to invest elsewhere. Fab 34 will utilize Intel's 4 and 3 manufacturing technologies.The agreement mandates that Intel purchase a minimum amount of the factory's output for its own sales or on behalf of clients. The pact also prioritizes Fab 34 for production within Intel's network.In 2022, Intel secured a $15 billion commitment from Brookfield Infrastructure Partners LP to help finance an Arizona semiconductor complex, alleviating initial concerns regarding the excessive costs of Gelsinger's revitalization plan.However, a series of disappointing earnings reports and market share losses to competitors like Nvidia Corp. have reignited those anxieties and negatively impacted Intel's stock price.
Article Summary: Intel Corp has reportedly struck a deal with Apollo Global Management Inc to sell a stake in a venture controlling an Irish plant for $11 billion. This move aims to secure additional funding for Intel's significant factory network expansion. The transaction, finalizing in the second quarter of 2024, frees up capital for Intel to invest elsewhere.

Article Title: Intel is teaming up with this South Korea-based internet giant to counter Nvidia’s dominance of AI industry
Article Text: Intel and Naver are reportedly joining forces to challenge Nvidia 's leading position in the AI chip market. According to a report in Bloomberg, the collaboration between the Santa Clara, California-based chipmaker and South Korea's internet giant focuses on expanding the software ecosystem for Intel's Gaudi AI accelerator, an open-source platform. This partnership is part of a growing effort to loosen Nvidia's grip on the sector, especially as difficulties arise in obtaining GPU accelerators for training AI models."The current monopoly situation has to change in order to expand the market and address the limitations in AI development caused by the GPU supply chain," said Ha Jung-Woo, head of Naver's Future AI Center, during an Intel AI conference held in Seoul, as per the report. Ha is a key figure behind Naver's HyperClova X family of large language models.This alliance is further solidified by the recent establishment of a joint AI chip research lab accessible to leading South Korean universities and startups."Our collaboration with Naver holds immense strategic value because we share a common vision for a strong AI ecosystem," said Justin Hotard, Intel's executive vice president and general manager of data center and AI.
Article Summary: Intel and Naver are reportedly joining forces to challenge Nvidia's leading position in the AI chip market. The collaboration focuses on expanding the software ecosystem for Intel's Gaudi AI accelerator, an open-source platform. This partnership is part of a growing effort to loosen Nvidia's grip on the sector.

Article Title: TCS, Infosys, and other 3 India’s top IT firms report net exit of 25,000 women employees in FY24
Article Text:
Challenges in advancing women to leadership roles

Higher attrition rates

Efforts to improve gender diversity

Also read

In the fiscal year ending March 2024, five of India's leading IT services companies—Infosys, TCS, Wipro, LTI Mindtree, and HCL Tech—experienced a cumulative net exit of 25,000 women employees. This data, compiled by staffing firm Xpheno, highlights a concerning trend in gender diversity within these organisations.Despite a notable increase in the absolute number of women employed since the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic, the growth in the diversity ratio has stagnated. From March 2020 to March 2023, the number of women in these firms increased from approximately 374,000 to 540,000. However, by the end of FY24, this number had decreased to 515,000.According to an ET report, the total number of women employees grew by about 141,000 (38%) between 2020 and 2024, but the diversity ratio only saw a marginal increase of 0.9 percentage points. This indicates a parallel increase in the hiring of male employees, resulting in a flat diversity ratio.“Such parallel growth in intake scale will continue to drive constant and flat gender ratios as we are witnessing now,” commented Shincy Morris, Business Head - Direct Hiring at Xpheno.In the January-March 2024 quarter, the average diversity ratio stood at 34.26%, a slight decline from 34.32% in the previous year. Pre-pandemic years (2018-2020) saw a stronger growth in diversity, with an increase of 1.56 percentage points among the five IT firms.Data from Avtar Group, a prominent diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) solutions company, reveals a significant drop-off in women reaching leadership roles in the Indian IT industry. The diversity ratio at the senior level is just 17%, compared to 35% at the entry level.“This lack of progression can be discouraging for ambitious women,” said Saundarya Rajesh, Founder-President of Avtar Group. “Imagine dedicating yourself to a field, only to face constant hurdles to advancement and fair compensation. Feeling undervalued and passed over for promotions can be incredibly demotivating.”Women in the tech sector face higher attrition rates, with a 26% attrition rate compared to 21% across all industry sectors, according to Avtar’s data. The pressure to excel in a demanding field while managing personal commitments leads to burnout, resulting in high attrition rates.“Clearly, the lack of advancement opportunities is discouraging for new hires from diverse backgrounds,” added Rajesh.In recent years, there has been a rise in programs aimed at attracting and retaining high-potential women in the tech workforce. According to Avtar’s data, post-pandemic DEI intent has increased from 73% to 77%.“It is crucial that these programmes have the buy-in of the CEOs. Hiring a bunch of people who are ‘different’ candidates does not guarantee inclusion,” emphasised Rajesh.Krishna Vij, Business Head at Teamlease Digital, remarked, “Tackling the gender gap in leadership positions is crucial. This can be achieved by implementing policies that support women during pivotal life stages, such as offering flexible work arrangements, mentorship programs, and promoting return-to-work initiatives for those re-entering the workforce after a career hiatus.”
Article Summary: Infosys, TCS, Wipro, LTI Mindtree, and HCL Tech experienced a cumulative net exit of 25,000 women employees in the fiscal year ending March 2024. Despite a notable increase in the absolute number of women employed since the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic, the diversity ratio has stagnated.

Article Title: Microsoft re-opens beta program for Windows 10: What it means for users
Article Text:
Windows Insider program from Windows 10 users: How to access



What this means for Windows 11 users

For Insiders on a Windows 10 PC that meets the minimum system requirements for Windows 11:



Microsoft will not automatically upgrade users to Windows 11 when they join the Beta Channel. The Windows 11 upgrade will be available as optional, where users can choose to upgrade when they are ready.

when they join the Beta Channel. The Windows 11 upgrade will be available as optional, where users can choose to upgrade when they are ready. Users will be able to switch to the Canary or Dev Channels but in doing so it will upgrade your PC to the latest Windows 11 build for those channels.

but in doing so it will upgrade your PC to the latest Windows 11 build for those channels. If users switch to the Canary or Dev Channels, they will have a small window to roll back to Windows 10 but once this window closes, the only way to go back to the Beta Channel and/or Windows 10 will be to do a clean install of Windows.

For Insiders on a Windows 10 PC that don’t meet the minimum system requirements for Windows 11:



Users will not see the option to switch to the Canary or Dev Channels as these channels are only for Windows 11 Insider Preview builds.

The Windows 10 end-of-support date of October 14, 2025, is unchanged. Joining the Beta Channel on your Windows 10 PC won’t change that.

Microsoft ended the beta channel for Windows Insiders on Windows 10 at the end of 2023. The US-based tech giant announced this change to ensure users get the maximum value from their current Windows PC. Now, to bring new features and more improvements to Windows 10 the company will still need a place to do active feature development with Windows Insiders.This has led Microsoft to re-open the Beta Channel for Windows Insiders currently on Windows 10. This will allow the company to try out new features for Windows 10, version 22H2, with Insiders before releasing them to all Windows 10 customers.In a blog post, the company has confirmed that Windows Insiders who want to try out new features for Windows 10 can join or switch to the Beta Channel. Users can do this by going to Settings > Update & Security > Windows Insider Program. Here, users need to click on the current Insider Channel selection to expand and see the full list of Insider Channels and choose Beta Channel.Many features in the Beta Channel will be rolled out using Control Feature Rollout technology, starting with a subset of Insiders and ramping up over time as we monitor feedback to see how they land before pushing them out to everyone in this channel.Insiders in the Beta Channel who want to be the first to get features gradually rolled out to you can turn ON the toggle to get the latest updates as they are available via Settings > Updated & Security > Windows Update.Over time, Microsoft will increase the rollouts of features to everyone with the toggle turned on. If users keep this toggle off, new features will gradually be rolled out to your device over time once they are ready.
Article Summary: Microsoft will not automatically upgrade users to Windows 11 when they join the Beta Channel. The Windows 11 upgrade will be available as optional, where users can choose to upgrade when they are ready. Users will not see the option to switch to the Canary or Dev Channels as these channels are only for Windows 11 Insider Preview builds.

Article Title: Apple TV+ may become the first US streaming service to be ‘officially’ available in China
Article Text:
Apple's plans to launch the service in 2023



Appe TV+ may come to China at a lower price



Apple is reportedly planning to launch Apple TV+ in China and has already held talks with the country’s telecom giant China Mobile for the same. According to a report by The Information, if the Cupertino-based tech giant strikes a deal, Apple TV+ would become the only US streaming service to have a presence in China.Typically, Chinese law prevents US services from distributing their content directly.The report claims that under the proposed deal, China Mobile may offer Apple TV+ subscription for a monthly fee, and may even feature its content on the company’s set-top boxes. Apple and China Mobile are expected to split the revenue from the arrangement.However, if a deal has been finalised, it would likely not allow for the iPhone TV app to include Apple’s content in the region, as that would violate Chinese law, the report added.Apple apparently wanted to announce the partnership last year. However, that didn’t happen as something fell through. Previous reports suggested that talks between the two companies were said to be underway at the end of 2023. The report also doesn’t reveal the current status of the negotiations as well.Like many emerging markets, content subscriptions services are usually offered at far cheaper prices in China than in the US. For example,Apple Music in China is less than $2 per month compared to $10.99 per month in the US.As per the report, Apple TV+ would also likely be offered at a significantly lower price in China. The prices may remain lower due to weaker consumer pricing power and as most of Apple’s content is English-centric, the report noted.However, assuming that the legal and business operational challenges can be navigated, the potential economic rewards may be huge due to the size of China’s population. The report also claims that Apple is also exploring ways to launch other services offerings like Apple Arcade in China as well.Last week, rumours claimed that Apple is developing a TV app for Android which will be another attempt at reaching a new base of subscribers.
Article Summary: Apple is reportedly planning to launch Apple TV+ in China in 2023. It has already held talks with the country’s telecom giant China Mobile for the same. Chinese law prevents US services from distributing their content directly. Apple and China Mobile are expected to split the revenue from the arrangement. However, if a deal has been finalised, it would likely not allow for the iPhone TV app to include Apple's content in the region.

Article Title: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger on how the company is looking to regain top chipmaker spot: “We want to build...”
Article Text:
How Intel wants to boost its fortunes

Intel has a plan to regain its leadership in the chipmaking space. At Computex 2024, the US-based company announced its Lunar Lake, AI accelerator processors and Intel’s Xeon 6 chips. Speaking on these lines, company CEO Pat Gelsinger has said that Intel wants to build “everybody’s AI chips .“We want to build everybody’s chips, everybody’s AI chips. We want them to be built leveraging the U.S. factories,” Gelsinger told CNBC.Intel has been overtaken by rivals TSMC and Samsung in recent years, and at the same time, is facing tough competition from Qualcomm, Nvidia and AMD.Intel was the world’s largest chipmaker but in 2017, Samsung Electronics surpassed it in revenue. TSMC, which makes chips for Apple, reportedly leapfrogged Samsung in 2023 to become the world’s largest foundry by revenue.“The first piece is to get back to leadership, because a lot of the losses are associated with having uncompetitive process technology,” said Gelsinger.Intel posted an operating loss of $7 billion in 2023 as it looks to boost its struggling foundry business. It is currently not in the top six foundries by revenue, a Counterpoint Research report said last month.Intel recently got $8.5 billion in CHIPS and Science Act funding from the Biden administration and may potentially get another $11 billion. The capital is likely to help Intel advance its semiconductor manufacturing, research and development.“The capital is critical. And what we said is that we have to have economic competitiveness if we’re going to build these factories in the US and that’s what the chips Act has done. It’s created a level playing field if I were building a factory in Asia versus US,” Gelsinger said.
Article Summary: Intel has a plan to regain its leadership in the chipmaking space. At Computex 2024, the US-based company announced its Lunar Lake, AI accelerator processors and Intel’s Xeon 6 chips.Intel has been overtaken by rivals TSMC and Samsung in recent years. It is also facing tough competition from Qualcomm, Nvidia and AMD.

Article Title: Microsoft Layoffs: Microsoft job cuts: Company may have laid off 1000 jobs in these two units
Article Text:
Microsoft job cuts at Azure cloud division

Microsoft job cuts at mixed reality division

Microsoft is reportedly laying off more than 1,000 employees across different businesses, a report has said. The cuts come after significant rounds of layoffs at Microsoft, when the company announced it will cut 10,000 roles throughout 2023.Citing people familiar with the situation, The Information reported that “most of the job cuts are within the company’s Strategic Missions and Technologies org, which aims to sell Microsoft’s cloud software and server rentals for businesses with highly specified needs such as telecom firms and space companies.”Microsoft is also cutting jobs in its mixed reality unit but will continue to support the HoloLens 2 augmented reality device.The company said that the cuts “are a necessary and regular part of managing our business” as Microsoft focuses on hiring “in strategic growth areas.”“Earlier today we announced a restructuring of the Microsoft’s Mixed Reality organisation. We remain fully committed to the Department of Defense’s IVAS program and will continue to deliver cutting edge technology to support our soldiers. In addition, we will continue to invest in W365 to reach the broader Mixed Reality hardware ecosystem. We will continue to sell HoloLens 2 while supporting existing HoloLens 2 customers and partners,” a spokesperson said in an email sent to CNBC.Microsoft also reaffirmed its commitment to Mesh, a feature allowing headset wearers to join 3D video calls in Teams alongside colleagues on any device. During last year’s Microsoft Ignite conference in November, company CEO Satya Nadella said that the company's focus is on "reimagining how employees connect and collaborate," regardless of their device (PC, HoloLens, Meta headset, etc.).
Article Summary: Microsoft reportedly laying off more than 1,000 employees across different businesses. Cuts come after significant rounds of layoffs at Microsoft, when the company announced it will cut 10,000 roles throughout 2023. Microsoft said that the cuts “are a necessary and regular part of managing our business”

Article Title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro vs iPhone 16 Pro Max: Rumoured differences between the two Pro models
Article Text:
Display size

and dimension

Improved camera

Battery

The next-generation iPhones, likely to be called the iPhone 16 series, are expected to launch later this year in September with new features, changes and improvements. Leaks and rumours have already revealed some key changes that the iPhone 16 series will come packed with.The most notable change that we expect to see is in the top-of-the-line iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max models. This includes a bigger display, an improved camera and more. Here’s our speculation on how the two Pro models will differ.This one is a bit obvious. The iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max always had the screen size difference. This time around, however, the screen sizes are changing too. The iPhone 16 Pro is expected to feature a 6.3-inch display instead of 6.1-inch. And, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is rumoured to come with a 6.9-inch display which will make the iPhone 16 Pro Max to offer the biggest display ever on an iPhone.Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max with a slightly bigger display, is expected to come with a slightly taller design. However, the overall thickness of the phone is expected to remain unchanged. Also, the iPhone 16 Pro will be lighter compared to the iPhone 16 Pro Max.Apple is also expected to make certain changes to the camera setup of both iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max. Both the Pro models are expected to feature the updated 48MP ultra-wide sensor along with the 48MP main sensor. Additionally, Apple will update the telephoto lens from 3x to 5x (same as iPhone 16 Pro Max) on the iPhone 16 Pro models.The camera setup is expected to offer better low-light performance, dynamic range and several other improvements in terms of image quality.Apple iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max is also expected to come with improved battery capacity. This means, the two models could offer better battery life compared to the iPhone 15 Pro models. However, the iPhone 16 Pro is expected to come with smaller battery compared to iPhone 16 Pro Max.
Article Summary: The next-generation iPhones are expected to launch later this year in September. Leaks and rumours have already revealed some key changes that the iPhone 16 series will come packed with. The most notable change that we expect to see is in the top-of-the-line iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16pro Max models. This includes a bigger display, an improved camera and more.

Article Title: Ather 450 Apex electric scooter prices go up as introductory offer ends: Check how much
Article Text:
Ather 450 Apex Review: Most exciting electric scooter yet! | TOI Auto

Ather Energy 's performance-oriented electric scooter , the Ather 450 Apex , has received a substantial price bump following the conclusion of its introductory offer. Launched in January 2024, the scooter was initially priced at Rs 1.89 lakh, ex-showroom. Now, it has received a price hike of Rs 6,000, thus taking its price at Rs 1.95 lakh, ex-showroom, making it the company’s flagship model.The Ather 450 Apex is a limited-production model featuring a 7 kW electric motor paired with a 3.7 kWh battery pack . The manufacturer claims that the scooter can accelerate from 0 to 40 kmph in just 2.9 seconds, making it the fastest in their range of e-scooters.The scooter’s top speed is governed at 100 kmph. Speaking of range, it boasts an IDC range of 157 km on a fully juiced battery. The 450 Apex gets six ride modes: Smart Eco, Eco, Ride, Sport, Warp, and the Warp Plus. In terms of features, it boasts a seven-inch touchscreen with Bluetooth connectivity and navigation.While the Ather 450 Apex shares many similarities with the 450X Gen3 model, it stands out with its unique aesthetic design. The Apex sports a distinctive two-layer "Indium Blue'' paint scheme, highlighted by contrasting orange accents on the wheels, logos, and translucent panels. It is worth noting that this special-edition e-scooter will only be in production until October 2024.Stay tuned to TOI Auto for latest updates on the automotive sector and do follow us on our social media handles on Facebook, Instagram and X.
Article Summary: The Ather 450 Apex is a limited-production model featuring a 7 kW electric motor paired with a 3.7 kWh battery pack. The scooter can accelerate from 0 to 40 kmph in just 2.9 seconds, making it the fastest in their range of e-scooters. The Apex sports a distinctive two-layer "Indium Blue'' paint scheme.

Article Text:
What is Ads Revenue Sharing on X?

How to become eligible for Ads Revenue Sharing?

Complete identity verification.

Article Title: What temperature should you set your AC at night: Tips to save on electricity bills
Article Text:
“The 24 degree Celsius

default setting

has been made mandatory from Jan 1, 2020 for all room air conditioners covered under the ambit of BEE star-labelling program vide this notification. Additionally, the

Indian Seasonal Energy Efficiency Ratio

(ISEER) as per the new standards will range from (3.30 - 5.00) for split and (2.70 – 3.50) for window air conditioners”

How setting your AC to the default temperature is important



Humidity can force you to decrease temperature



Proper airflow will cool your room faster



Smart ACs can add to convenience



This question related to AC must have popped up in your head: What is the ideal temperature for the air conditioning (AC) while sleeping? Well, it is important to find the perfect balance between staying cool and maintaining energy efficiency becomes a priority as the scorching summer heat takes hold. Having said that, the answer is not straightforward.According to a government advisory shared in consultation with the Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE) fixed the default temperature according to new energy performance standards for Room Air Conditioner (RACs)., the advisory says.Setting the right temperature while sleeping can also help you save your electricity bills . Air conditioners consume more energy to maintain lower temperatures. The closer the indoor temperature is to the outdoor temperature, the less the AC has to work, resulting in lower energy consumption.By setting your AC to an optimal temperature while you sleep, you can significantly reduce energy usage and save on electricity bills . Also, setting the temperature to 18 won’t make your AC cool faster but will consume more electricity. So it’s better to keep the AC in its default temperature.High humidity can make a room feel warmer than it is. Using a dehumidifier alongside your AC can help maintain a comfortable environment.Proper air circulation can enhance the cooling effect of your AC. Consider using a ceiling fan or a portable fan to help distribute cool air more evenly.Smart ACs can be controlled through your smartphone and will allow you to set different temperatures for different times of the day. You can program it to cool your bedroom just before bedtime and raise the temperature slightly as you wake up.
Article Summary: The default temperature has been fixed according to new energy performance standards for Room Air Conditioner (RACs) Air conditioners consume more energy to maintain lower temperatures. The closer the indoor temperature is to the outdoor temperature, the less the AC has to work, resulting in lower energy consumption.

Article Title: Apple iOS 18 update release date: This is when the next-generation iPhone operating system will arrive
Article Text:
iOS 18 release date, live streaming and more

What’s new coming to Apple ecosystem

Apple Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) event month is here and next week, the company will unwrap the next-generation operating systems for Apple iPhone, iPad, Mac, Watch, TV and others.The event’s agenda is expected to revolve around the AI push where the company is speculated to announce several new AI-powered features into core apps and features including Photos, Messages, Notes and Safari browser.Mark Gurman , in his latest Power On newsletter, has revealed multiple new insights including new AI features, and changes Apple is set to announce at the WWDC event .Apple’s five-day developer's conference is scheduled for next week. The keynote will start on June 10 at 10:30 pm IST. This is an in-person event, but Apple will also livestream it on its website and official YouTube channel.Gurman has highlighted that Apple will make the AI push into its ecosystem with the next-generation operating systems.The newsletter mentions that Apple is preparing to integrate AI into core apps like Photos, Messages, Notes, and Safari. The AI will handle tasks such as voice memo transcriptions, recaps of meetings, text messages, emails, and articles. It will also create AI-generated emojis.Siri will be overhauled with large language models. The new system will allow Siri to control individual features within applications without user setup. Siri will analyse user activities and auto-enable assistance. Examples include deleting or forwarding emails, editing photos, summarising meetings, and moving notes within apps. This feature will expand to handle multiple commands at once, such as writing and sending an email.The Settings app will have a revamped interface, better organisation, and improved search.Control Center is also expected to receive a new music widget and enhancements for smart home appliance control. The Messages app will introduce new icons for Tapbacks and effects for individual words. The Photos app will get an updated interface, and Mail will see various improvements.In watchOS 11, the updates include an updated interface for Siri and upgrades to the Fitness app. Vision Pro headset users will receive visionOS 2.0, which will introduce dedicated versions of Apple’s apps instead of using iPad versions.
Article Summary: Apple’s five-day developer's conference is scheduled for next week. The keynote will start on June 10 at 10:30 pm IST. Apple will also livestream it on its website and official YouTube channel. The newsletter mentions that Apple is preparing to integrate AI into core apps like Photos, Messages, Notes, and Safari.

Article Title: WhatsApp’s Tipline helps in tackling deepfakes in India during Lok Sabha Elections 2024
Article Text:
WhatsApp Tipline launch and usage

Initiation of Tipline

Multilingual support

How to use WhatsApp Tipline

Send a message to the WhatsApp Tipline number, +91 9999025044.

Share the questionable audio or video for verification.

Receive an assessment report indicating whether the media is AI-generated or contains AI elements.

Types of content analyzed by WhatsApp Tipline

WhatsApp Tipline technology behind the detection

Deepfake detection

Collaborative model

WhatsApp’s Tipline impact and future prospects

Also read

As India undergoes its largest democratic exercise, the Lok Sabha Elections 2024 , WhatsApp’s Tipline has emerged as a crucial tool for combating the spread of deepfakes and misinformation. Created by the Misinformation Combat Alliance’s (MCA) Deepfakes Analysis Unit (DAU), the Tipline aims to raise public awareness and provide assistance in identifying AI-manipulated content.: Launched in March 2024, WhatsApp’s Tipline has quickly become a trusted resource for users seeking to verify the authenticity of images and videos. Since its inception, the Tipline has received hundreds of messages from users asking for help in distinguishing real from fake content.: The Tipline is accessible in multiple languages, including Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and English, making it widely usable across India’s diverse linguistic landscape.Users can flag suspected deepfake content by sending audio notes or videos to the Tipline. The process is listed below:Most of the manipulated content received involves doctored videos where the original audio is altered using AI to make a person appear to say something they did not. These videos often feature prominent figures such as actors, businessmen, politicians, and TV anchors. Additionally, AI-created memes of politicians using face-blending techniques or other less sophisticated methods have been commonly reported.WhatsApp’s Tipline uses advanced generative AI to analyze and detect deepfakes. This involves reconstructing the mouth movements of subjects to sync with altered audio, making the deepfakes appear more convincing.Pamposh Raina, Head of the DAU, emphasized the collaborative nature of the DAU’s approach. By partnering with detection and forensic experts, the DAU supports its fact-checking partners who play a critical role in this project. Raina stated, “The strength of the DAU lies in the collaborative model which it is building by partnering with detection and forensic experts. Our goal is to drive public awareness on the issue of algorithm-based fabrication, and I am confident that this symbiotic model can be replicated globally to combat misinformation spread through audio and video content produced using generative AI.”The successful implementation of WhatsApp’s Tipline during the Lok Sabha elections 2024 highlights the potential of such tools in combating misinformation. As deepfake technology continues to evolve, the need for robust detection and public awareness mechanisms becomes increasingly critical. WhatsApp’s initiative sets a precedent for similar efforts worldwide, showcasing how technology and collaboration can effectively address the challenges posed by AI-generated misinformation.
Article Summary: WhatsApp’s Tipline uses advanced generative AI to analyze and detect deepfakes. Users can flag suspected deepfake content by sending audio notes or videos to the Ti Pline. The successful implementation of WhatsApp's Tiplline during the Lok Sabha elections 2024 highlights the potential of such tools in combating misinformation.

Article Title: What PM Narendra Modi told Sunil Mittal in the meeting that proved to be "turning point" for Bharti Airtel
Article Text:
“I sought a meeting with the PM Modi”

Airtel’s $100-billion market cap is testimony to today’s India

A meeting with PM Narendra Modi in September of the year 2018 proved to be a turning point for Airtel, according to Bharti Airtel chairman Sunil Bharti Mittal. In an exclusive interview to Economic Times, Mittal spoke about a range of things including his meeting with PM Modi, Airtel's journey to $100 billion market capitalisation and more.Mittal recalled Reliance Jio's entry in the year 2016 and how it turned the industry upside down. "September 2016 was the Jio launch and 2018 was the time when I think the industry was in the most distress… Ebitda had crashed due to the free services. We had to keep going down (in terms of tariffs). Then the first losses started at that time after many years and debt was pretty high. So the company was shaky. And in March 2018, I still recall that you could sense a concern among the rank and file of the company. You could see it on the faces of professionals working at Airtel. Company after company was folding up — Tatas selling to us, three companies going into NCLT. And that was the time that the regulatory hits started to bother me. Regulations, which were coming one after the other, were disturbing," said."And then in 2018, I sought a meeting with the PM," he went on to add. "I was still the chairman of GSMA… just coming out from the chairmanship of the International Chamber of Commerce, when I used to brief him (PM) occasionally on WTO, G20 and other issues. So, I took his permission to talk about the Indian telecom industry. I told him that things were very bad and the situation was getting very alarming. I said I will fight in the marketplace, but I can’t fight the government… we spoke in Hindi. He told me that this government will not tilt towards either side. Whatever is good for the country will be done. You fight in the marketplace... I don’t have a view on that. But you can be sure that the government will not take sides," Mittal said.He went on to add how the PM's words kind of assured him. That was enough for me. I got up and I thanked him, and said, “I will fight in the market”. This was the turning point."Talking about Airtel's $100 billion market cap milestone, Mittal said, "This $100-billion market cap is a testimony to what India is today, not just my company. Money is pouring into this country, a lot of capital is coming in, investments are coming in, the stock market is rising. These massive valuations are a function of a stable, solid, functional economy under a very solid leader."
Article Summary: Bharti Airtel chairman Sunil Bharti Mittal spoke about his meeting with PM Narendra Modi. Mittal recalled Reliance Jio's entry in the year 2016 and how it turned the industry upside down. "This $100-billion market cap is a testimony to what India is today, not just my company," said.

Article Title: Google Layoffs: Google has cut jobs in one of its fastest-growing businesses
Article Text:
Google on job cuts at Google Cloud



Google is reportedly cutting jobs in one of its fastest-growing businesses globally. According to a report in CNBC, Google parent Alphabet is laying off employees from several teams in Google’s cloud unit, one of its fastest-growing businesses.The company is said to have informed employees last week of the cuts in the Cloud team. As per an internal note viewed by CNBC, the roles being eliminated are in sales, consulting, “go-to-market” strategy, operations and engineering. At least 100 positions were cut, said people reportedly familiar with the matter and asked not to be named.A Google spokesperson told CNBC that the cuts are incremental across teams to better align its go-to-market organization. “As we’ve shared before, we continue to evolve our business to meet our customers’ priorities and the significant opportunity ahead,” the spokesperson said. “We maintain our commitment to investing in areas that are critical to our business and ensure our long-term success.”The report further added that some of those who lost their jobs had worked on the company’s annual Google Cloud Next that took place in mid-April.Google first announced job cuts in January 2023, since then the company has announced numerous round of layoffs. Last month, Google cut at least 200 employees from its “Core” organization, which included key teams and engineering talent. CEO Sundar Pichai told employees that the company would have fewer layoffs in the second half of 2024.Google Cloud business reported $40 billion annual revenue as the company overall delivered strong first quarter results. Google parent Alphabet reported first quarter revenue of $80.54 billion, up 15% from a year ago. Gogle CEO Sundar Pichai said first quarter results were driven by strength in search, YouTube and Google Cloud. "We are well under way with our Gemini era and there’s great momentum across the company. Our leadership in AI research and infrastructure, and our global product footprint, position us well for the next wave of AI innovation."
Article Summary: Google Cloud business reported $40 billion annual revenue as the company overall delivered strong first quarter results. Google parent Alphabet reported first quarter revenue of $80.54 billion, up 15% from a year ago. CEO Sundar Pichai told employees that the company would have fewer layoffs in the second half of 2024.

Article Title: Tech layoffs 2024 touch 89,000: Google, Microsoft, TikTok, Tesla and these companies cut hundreds of jobs in May
Article Text:
Google cut jobs in core teams



Indeed fired 1,000 employees



Toshiba laid off 4,000 employees



TikTok fired 1,000 operation and marketing employees globally



Walmart announced job cuts and staff relocation



Microsoft cuts jobs in gaming division



Tesla trims down workforce



While the tech industry experienced layoffs throughout 2024, May saw a notable decrease compared to previous months. According to layoffs.fyi, a website tracking global job cuts , 39 companies laid off a total of 9,742 employees in May. This represents a significant drop from April's reported 21,473 layoffs across 50 companies.Google fired around 200 employees from its Core teams. These job cuts have reportedly impacted engineering positions in Sunnyvale, California. The layoffs are reportedly part of the downsizing effort that began last year when Alphabet announced plans to reduce its workforce by about 6%.The job-searching website Indeed nearly fired 8% of its workforce in May, 2024. The layoff primarily impacted the US employees of the company. The second round of layoffs affected employees in the research and development units, as well as other teams responsible for delivering products to customers.Toshiba announced 4,000 job cuts domestically as part of company’s restructuring efforts. The job cuts represent 6% of Toshiba’s local workforce. Along with this job cuts, the company is also planning to move some office functions from central Tokyo to Kawasaki, a city west of the capital.Popular short-video platform, TikTok fired 1,000 employees globally. The layoff impacted employees from the operations and marketing teams. Although TikTok has given limited official reasons for the layoffs, industry analysts speculate on several potential factors. Some suggest it may be a cost-cutting measure, particularly in response to the constantly changing regulatory environment affecting social media giants.Walmart is reportedly cutting jobs and asking employees at various tech hubs to relocate. These layoffs are expected to impact the company’s corporate employees, as the largest retailer has been trying to reduce its workforce for some time. The exact number of employees being laid off or asked to relocate is not yet known.The month of May witnessed job cuts in the gaming division of Microsoft. The tech giant reportedly closed multiple developers including the including Redfall developer Arkane Austin, Hi-Fi Rush developer Tango Gameworks, Alpha Dog Studios and more. A report by IGN claims that some of the affected employees will be relocated and others will have to depart. It is not clear whether the latest layoffs are a part of the job cuts announced by the company earlier this year.Elon Musk-owned Tesla fired employees from software, service and engineering departments. As per a report, the company laid off more than 6,700 employees in multiple locations including Texas, California and more.
Article Summary: 39 companies laid off a total of 9,742 employees in May. This represents a significant drop from April's reported 21,473 layoffs across 50 companies. Google fired around 200 employees from its Core teams. Indeed nearly fired 8% of its workforce in May, 2024.

Article Title: Samsung Galaxy F54 gets second price cut: Here’s how much the smartphone costs
Article Text:
New price

Samsung Galaxy F54 specifications

Samsung recently launched the all-new Galaxy F55 smartphone in India. It is the first Galaxy F-series smartphone of the company to come with a vegan leather back panel design. Soon, after the launch, the South Korean smartphone maker slashed the price of Samsung Galaxy F54 .Launched in June 2023, the Samsung Galaxy F54 has received a second price cut. The smartphone witnessed the first price drop in February 2024. The mid-range smartphone of the company has now received a price cut of Rs 5,000 earlier this year. After the price drop the Galaxy F54 smartphone was selling at Rs 24,999. Now the company has further slashed the price of the smartphone by Rs 2,000.After the second price cut of Rs 2,000, customers can purchase the Samsung Galaxy F54 at Rs 22,999. The smartphone comes in Stardust Silver and Meteor Blue colour options.The Samsung Galaxy F54 5G features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It is powered by an octa-core Exynos 1380 chipset, reaching a maximum clock speed of 2.4GHz. Equipped with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage, the device also offers RAM Plus technology, allowing for virtual RAM expansion of up to 8GB.The phone's standout feature is its camera setup. It includes a triple-rear camera system with a 108MP primary shooter featuring Optical Image Stabilization (OIS), an 8MP ultra-wide sensor, and a 2MP macro lens. For selfies, it has a 32MP front camera.Samsung has integrated several flagship-like features into this device. Nightography enables detailed low-light photography using nona-binning technology, complemented by a dedicated Night Mode and Auto Night Mode.The No Shake Cam feature ensures stable video recording in various lighting conditions through the combination of OIS and VDIS, with the primary camera offering a 1.5-degree corrective angle for enhanced shake reduction. The smartphone is backed by a 6000mAh battery with 25W fast charging support.
Article Summary: The Samsung Galaxy F54 has received a second price cut. The smartphone witnessed the first price drop in February 2024. It is powered by an octa-core Exynos 1380 chipset, reaching a maximum clock speed of 2.4GHz. It includes a triple-rear camera system with a 108MP primary shooter.

Article Title: Smart tips to reduce your summer electricity bill
Article Text:
Reduce electricity bills with smart tips

Purchase electrical appliances with a 5-star BEE rating

Switch to LED Lights

Transition to smart appliances for remote control and enhanced efficiency

Switch to BLDC fans

Utilise solar energy with solar panels

Set AC temperature at 24 degrees Celsius

Enable energy metering with smart Wi-Fi

Regularly servicing and maintaining home appliances to ensure peak performance

Utilise power strips for connecting multiple devices

Turn off electrical appliances when not in use

Alternative sources for reducing home electricity bills

Solar Energy: Solar power is a readily available and environmentally friendly energy source. You can choose solar water heating systems or photovoltaic solar panels. These can be installed on rooftops or in open areas to generate electricity for various household needs.

Wind Energy: Living in windy regions? Consider a small-scale wind turbine as an effective alternative energy source. These turbines harness wind power and convert it into electricity.

Biomass Energy: Biomass energy involves utilising organic materials such as wood pellets, agricultural waste, or animal waste to produce heat or electricity. Biomass stoves or boilers can efficiently provide heating or hot water while reducing reliance on conventional electricity sources.

Also read

During summer months, many households experience a significant increase in electricity consumption due to higher cooling needs. While staying comfortable during hot weather is essential, it doesn't have to come at the cost of soaring electricity bills. By implementing strategic energy-saving practices, you can reduce your summer electricity expenses without sacrificing comfort.Here you can explore several effective ways to save on summer electricity bills, offering practical tips and strategies that can help you minimise energy consumption and lower your utility costs during the warmer months. From optimising your cooling system to adopting energy-efficient habits, these recommendations are designed to make a noticeable impact on your electricity expenses while keeping your home cool and comfortable.Let's delve into these actionable tips that can help you save money and energy throughout the summer season.The Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE) issues BEE Star Labels as a voluntary method for manufacturers to indicate an appliance's energy efficiency. The label uses stars to indicate the efficiency of a product, with more stars indicating higher efficiency. Simply put, the higher the energy efficiency rating of the appliance, the lower its energy consumption. To effectively reduce your home's energy costs, opt for appliances with a 5-star BEE rating. Not only does this positively impact the environment, but it also helps lower your electricity bills. Explore Crompton's wide range of 5-star rated ceiling fans to learn more about BEE Rating Appliances.If your home still uses CFLs and incandescent bulbs, it's time to replace them with LED bulbs. LED bulbs are not just a trendy choice; they are recognized for their energy efficiency and superior illumination. If you're wondering how to reduce your electricity bill at home, switching to LED bulbs is the solution for you.Upgrading to smart appliances is a highly effective method to decrease electricity consumption at home. These devices allow you to automate tasks and manage energy usage efficiently. Consider installing energy-efficient ceiling fans to further reduce electricity consumption. Smart appliances typically come equipped with remote control capabilities, allowing you to schedule operations and conserve power. Crompton offers remote-controlled fans designed for enhanced energy savings and lower power consumption.These energy-efficient fans are gaining popularity due to their brushless direct current motors (BLDC), which operate on direct current electricity. They can help save up to 60% on electricity compared to normal induction motor-based fans. Additionally, they offer convenient features like remote control for turning the fan on and off, timer functionality, and compatibility with voice assistants. To learn more about the differences between BLDC fans and normal fans and how they can help reduce electricity bills, explore further information on BLDC fans versus conventional fans.Implementing a full solar power system for your home can be a substantial investment. However, there are more accessible and cost-effective ways to leverage solar energy. Installing outdoor solar lights in your balcony and garden, along with solar fans, can notably reduce your energy expenses at a modest cost. Additionally, using solar pumps for daily tasks can contribute to electricity savings. It's beneficial to understand the distinction between an electric geyser and a solar geyser to make an informed choice for your energy needs.Maintain your air conditioner at 24 degrees Celsius to optimise cooling and conserve energy during the summer months, effectively lowering electricity costs. Additionally, using a timer to automate AC operation and upgrading to a 5-star BEE-rated model can further enhance energy efficiency and reduce expenses associated with cooling your space.Numerous advanced smart energy metres are currently offered in the market. These metres typically use Wi-Fi connectivity to monitor overall power usage within a home and provide real-time analysis of consumption patterns. Additionally, they can detect power leaks and identify high-energy-consuming appliances. Wi-Fi LED bulbs represent an excellent choice for reducing electricity usage.Regularly servicing and maintaining your home appliances is essential for optimal functionality and efficiency. Appliances that are not properly maintained are known to consume excessive energy, so routine maintenance can prolong their lifespan and reduce energy consumption. Learn more about the importance of cleaning exhaust fans.Install a power strip if you have several electronic devices or appliances that need to be plugged into a single electrical outlet. This allows you to easily turn off all devices at once when they are not in use, preventing unnecessary energy consumption often referred to as "phantom" energy loss.One of the simplest and most effective methods to lower electricity costs is by turning off electrical devices such as lights, fans, and air conditioners when they are not in use.
Article Summary: During summer months, many households experience a significant increase in electricity consumption due to higher cooling needs. By implementing strategic energy-saving practices, you can reduce your summer electricity expenses without sacrificing comfort. From optimising your cooling system to adopting energy- efficient habits, these recommendations are designed to make a noticeable impact on your electricity expenses.

Article Title: Anupam Mittal, Shark Tank judge on Lok Sabha election results: Picture abhi baaki hai
Article Text:
Here’s what Anupam Mittal's post reads

Ashneer Grover on Lok Shabha Elections 2024 results

Shark Tank Judge and CEO of Shaadi.com Anupam Mittal has shared his views on the Lok Shabha Elections 2024 results. Expressing his views on the election results, Mittal wrote Wow, what a mandate - especially UP” and “Never underestimate the power of the common man’ in a post on X (formerly Twitter).In the recent Lok Sabha election results declared on June 4th, 2024, the National Democratic Alliance has been granted the mandate to establish the central government. The NDA secured 293 seats, with the Bhartiya Janta Party clinching 240 seats. The Congress party secured victory in 99 seats.Mittal’s post also mentions “Wow, what a mandate - especially UP.” For those unaware, the Samajwadi Party secured 37 seats, while BJP secured 33 seats in UP.“Wow, what a mandate - especially UP. That’s why they say ‘never underestimate the power of the common man’ 🇮🇳 Now all eyes on BJP internal power dynamics & NDA politics. Picture abhi baaki hai”.Ashneer Grover, former MD and co-founder of BharatPe has also shared his views on the 2024 Lok Sabha results via a post on X.Grover said that "junta" (public) has showed everyone that they are "smarter than all politicians/pollsters. Respect”.“For me the result reinforces one thing - India mein parliamentary democracy hai. Sab MP chun rahe - not PM. So better MP candidate selection at micro constituency level made all the difference between perception and reality”, he further added.
Article Summary: Anupam Mittal has shared his views on the Lok Shabha Elections 2024 results. The National Democratic Alliance has been granted the mandate to establish the central government. The NDA secured 293 seats, with the Bhartiya Janta Party clinching 240 seats. The Congress party secured victory in 99 seats. For those unaware, the Samajwadi Party secured 37 seats, while BJP secured 33 seats.
